title: 4.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Consider the book_purchase.csv file available from the link provided here.

Perform the following using R:
1. Import the CSV file and create a data frame.
2. Clean the dataset to remove inconsistencies.
3. Export the data frame to a CSV file.go.qubitscs.com/EB50
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
